page.title: 02Way of Life: Rules
page.content: {School Rules:} If you are naughty you have more work instead of going out to break.If you are naughty you stay at school instead of going on the trip. {Family Rules:} When you are naughty you might be sent to bed or have no tea.If you are naughty you will not be allowed to watch T.V.,not allowed to go out,be smacked or shouted at. {Neighbourhood Rules:} Do not fish in ponds without permission.Do not go in peoples gardens without permission.Do not pick flowers in someones garden.Do not go blasting music around the neighbourhood.Do not vandalise peoples homes.Keep your dogs on the lead.
